SELECT b.book_id AS `id`, 'book' AS `type`, b.book_name AS title, b.book_desc AS `desc`, b.author, b.release_date FROM book b
WHERE b.book_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE b.author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE b.book_desc LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
UNION SELECT c.content_id AS `id`, c.content_type AS `type`,c.title AS title, c.content_desc AS `desc`, c.author, c.publication_date AS release_date FROM content c
WHERE c.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE c.author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE c.content_desc LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
UNION SELECT m.multifile_id AS `id`, 'multifile' AS `type`, m.title AS title, m.multi_desc AS `desc`, '' AS author, m.updated_at AS release_date FROM multifile m
WHERE m.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE 1=2
WHERE m.multi_desc LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
